content:
I'm running into an issue with #4 where my function returns L_decoded as a list of the individual integers rather than integers with multiple digits as requested; for example I'm getting [8, 4, 8, 7, 6] rather than [8, 4, 876].  I understand why my code is not producing the multiple digit integers but I'm not sure how to fix it. Any advice/ideas on how to better approach this?

This is what I have so far code-wise:
subject: practice problems #4

content:
The way I have approached it is by converting them to strings before decoding, decoding the strings one character at a time, then joining the strings back together, then converting them to integers.

A different, more mathy way of doing it, would be to decode the numbers, and then multiplying by powers of 10 to put them back together.
I feel like the wording of this question was extremely confusing.
